title: "Solar360, Repsol and Telefónica Joint Venture, Partners with Turbo Energy to Revolutionize Solar Self-Consumption Through Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "Solar360 complements its service with a photovoltaic production guarantee. In their commitment to their customers' savings, if the installation generates less energy than estimated in the offer, the company will compensate for the difference during the first year or throughout the amortization period if the customer chooses maintenance."
